job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtCompanyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDandy is a businessinabox for dentists Our vision is to become the operating system for every dental office in America by leading the transition to digital dentistry for the 200 billion industry Headquartered in New York City Dandy is backed by the worlds leading venture capital investorsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDandy is hiring a team of topflight software engineers to build digital products and scale our managed marketplace As one of Dandys first engineers you will play a key role in building our tech team Youll constantly be challenged to learn new technologies and be given the freedom to solve problems on your own and learn by doingltbrgtltbrgtOur stack TypeScript NodeJS NestJS ReactRedux PostgreSQLltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBuild our core engineering infrastructure including new product features and enhancementsltligtltligtWork closely across different business functions incorporating data from our operations sales and account management teams in order to craft elegant solutions to our most pressing challengesltligtltligtReinvent a broken experience and disrupt a legacy industry through novel and scalable product designltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWhat Were Looking ForltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtSoftware engineering experience preferably at a big tech or high growth startup environmentltligtltligtAbility to understand how our business functions and how challenges and bottlenecks can be addressed through the engineering teamltligtltligtCollaborative teamcentric mindset We are a small but mighty team and everyone must be aligned on our goalsltligtltligtWith the above stated we are open to candidates of all backgrounds and encourage you to apply if interested Dandy is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive team and none of the above points are 100 requiredltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtBonus Points ForltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience documenting coding and architectural decisionsltligtltligtExperience with TypeScriptltligtltligtTime spent at a venturebacked startup during hypergrowthltligtltligtRelentlessly positive attitude strong sense of humor and the ability to have fun at workltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBest in class healthcare including medical dental and visionltligtltligtCompetitive salary and equity packagesltligtltligtFully stocked kitchen with snacks and coffeeltligtltligt401k program ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtDandy is proud to be an equal opportunity employer We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture and celebrate authenticity We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation age marital status disability protected veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics
